title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Directions to the park headquarters: One Depot Square Woonsocket, RI 02895  From I-495 south   Follow I-495 south to Mass route 126 south (exit 18) Continue onto Social Street (as you enter Woonsocket) Continue straight past Monument Square (Civil War Monument, Stadium Theatre) Continue straight onto Main Street. Pass under railroad track to light at intersection with High Street. Turn right onto High Street Make immediate right into the National Heritage Corridor office (the former train depot )  From 146 south   Follow route 146 south to route 104 north exit (downtown Woonsocket) Take left at the end of ramp, onto Providence Street. Go straight through lights continuing on Providence Street all the way to the end. Turn right on South Main Street continue through Market Square onto Main Street to the light at intersection with High Street. Turn left onto High Street to enter the Heritage Corridor Office (former train depot).  From 146 north   Take right fork to route 146A North. Turn right on Park Avenue Continue to Hamlet Avenue. Turn left onto Hamlet Avenue. Cross over bridge and go straight through the intersection. The entrance to the Heritage Corridor Office (former train depot) is on the right immediately after the light.
